32 class VolumeKernel : public PatchKernel {
33 
34 public:
35  virtual ~VolumeKernel();
36 
37  bool isPointInside(double x, double y, double z) const;

39  bool isPointInside(long id, double x, double y, double z) const;
40  virtual bool isPointInside(long id, const std::array<double, 3> &point) const = 0;
41 
42  virtual double evalCellVolume(long id)const = 0;
43 
44  virtual double evalInterfaceArea(long id)const = 0;
45  virtual std::array<double,3> evalInterfaceNormal(long id)const = 0;
46

48 #if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
49  VolumeKernel(MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert);
50  VolumeKernel(int dimension, MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert);
51  VolumeKernel(int id, int dimension, MPI_Comm communicator, std::size_t haloSize, bool expert);
52 #else

56 #endif
